references.paper_title: Goal-oriented error estimation and mesh adaptation for shallow water modelling
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the current work, introducing goal-oriented error estimation and mesh adaptation for shallow water modeling, which is a central theme of the current work.

references.paper_title: Physics-informed neural networks: A deep learning framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), a deep learning framework for solving PDEs, which is relevant to the current work's use of neural networks for mesh movement.

references.paper_title: M2N: Mesh movement networks for PDE solvers
references.reason: This paper introduces Mesh Movement Networks (M2N), a prior approach to mesh movement using neural networks, which the current work improves upon.

references.paper_title: Optimal-transport-based mesh adaptivity on the plane and sphere using finite elements
references.reason: This paper introduces optimal transport-based mesh adaptivity, a method used in the current work to improve the efficiency and accuracy of mesh movement.
